entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 9:14 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:14 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
